data.lyric:
[ti:Old Town Road (Remix)]
[ar:Lil Nas X/Billy Ray Cyrus]
[al:Old Town Road (Remix)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Old Town Road (Remix) - Lil Nas X/Billy Ray Cyrus (比利·雷·赛勒斯)
[00:00.57]Lyrics by：Billy Ray Cyrus/Montero Lamar Hill/Michael Trent Reznor/Atticus Matthew Ross/Jocelyn Donald
[00:01.15]Composed by：Billy Ray Cyrus/Montero Lamar Hill/Michael Trent Reznor/Atticus Matthew Ross/Jocelyn Donald
[00:01.73]Billy Ray Cyrus：
[00:02.63]Oh oh oh
[00:09.51]Oh
[00:12.93]Yeah I'm gonna take my horse to the old town road
[00:16.99]I'm gonna ride 'til I can't no more
[00:20.34]I'm gonna take my horse to the old town road
[00:24.25]I'm gonna ride 'til I can't no more
[00:27.41]Kio Kio
[00:27.79]Lil Nas X：
[00:28.15]I got the horses in the back
[00:29.96]Horse tack is attached
[00:31.81]Hat is matte black
[00:33.14]Got the boots that's black to match
[00:35.45]Ridin' on a horse ha
[00:37.14]You can whip your Porsche
[00:38.90]I been in the valley
[00:40.17]You ain't been up off that porch now
[00:42.49]Can't nobody tell me nothin'
[00:46.27]You can't tell me nothin'
[00:49.51]Can't nobody tell me nothin'
[00:53.39]You can't tell me nothin'
[00:56.60]Ridin' on a tractor
[00:58.33]Lean all in my bladder
[01:00.08]Cheated on my baby
[01:01.79]You can go and ask her
[01:03.63]My life is a movie
[01:05.37]Bull ridin' and boobies
[01:07.15]Cowboy hat from Gucci
[01:08.90]Wrangler on my booty
[01:10.56]Can't nobody tell me nothin'
[01:14.46]You can't tell me nothin'
[01:17.67]Can't nobody tell me nothin'
[01:21.51]You can't tell me nothin'
[01:23.53]Yeah I'm gonna take my horse to the old town road
[01:27.75]I'm gonna ride 'til I can't no more
[01:31.22]I'm gonna take my horse to the old town road
[01:34.74]I'm gonna ride 'til I can't no more
[01:38.17]Billy Ray Cyrus：
[01:38.80]Hat down cross town livin' like a rockstar
[01:42.34]Spent a lot of money on my brand new guitar
[01:46.01]Baby's got a habit diamond rings and Fendi sports bras
[01:49.44]Ridin' down Rodeo in my Maserati sports car
[01:53.02]Got no stress I've been through all that
[01:55.85]I'm like a Marlboro Man so I kick on back
[01:59.37]Wish I could roll on back to that old town road
[02:02.93]I wanna ride 'til I can't no more
[02:06.05]Lil Nas X/Billy Ray Cyrus：
[02:06.06]Yeah I'm gonna take my horse to the old town road
[02:09.98]I'm gonna ride 'til I can't no more
[02:13.48]I'm gonna take my horse to the old town road
[02:17.05]I'm gonna ride 'til I can't no more
data.trans:
[ti:Old Town Road (Remix)]
[ar:Lil Nas X/Billy Ray Cyrus]
[al:Old Town Road (Remix)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.57]//
[00:01.15]//
[00:01.73]//
[00:02.63]//
[00:09.51]//
[00:12.93]我要在老城小路上 挥鞭策马
[00:16.99]势必要骑到筋疲力尽才罢休
[00:20.34]我要在老城小路上 挥鞭策马
[00:24.25]势必要骑到筋疲力尽才罢休
[00:27.41]//
[00:27.79]//
[00:28.15]我牵着骏马
[00:29.96]马掌已上钉
[00:31.81]头戴磨砂黑帽
[00:33.14]脚踩配套黑靴
[00:35.45]骑着骏马
[00:37.14]你开你的保时捷
[00:38.90]我在山谷穿梭之时
[00:40.17]你的车还没开出自家门廊
[00:42.49]无需他人对我各种说教
[00:46.27]你别对我指手画脚
[00:49.51]无需他人对我各种说教
[00:53.39]你别对我指手画脚
[00:56.60]开着拖拉机
[00:58.33]蓄势狂驰
[01:00.08]背着我的宝贝偷情
[01:01.79]你可以去问问她
[01:03.63]我的生活像电影一样精彩
[01:05.37]骑着公牛 带着个傻瓜
[01:07.15]古驰牌的牛仔帽
[01:08.90]Wrangler(牛仔品牌)加身 享受着奢华
[01:10.56]无需他人对我各种说教
[01:14.46]你别对我指手画脚
[01:17.67]无需他人对我各种说教
[01:21.51]你别对我指手画脚
[01:23.53]我要在老城小路上 挥鞭策马
[01:27.75]势必要骑到筋疲力尽才罢休
[01:31.22]我要在老城小路上 挥鞭策马
[01:34.74]势必要骑到筋疲力尽才罢休
[01:38.17]//
[01:38.80]压低帽檐 招摇过市 像摇滚明星一样风光
[01:42.34]花巨款抱回我崭新的吉他
[01:46.01]我的宝贝购物就停不下来 钻石戒指 芬迪运动胸衣
[01:49.44]驾驶着玛莎拉蒂跑车 一路狂飙
[01:53.02]毫无压力 一直这样轻松自在的生活
[01:55.85]我就像抽着万宝路的牛仔 潇洒肆意
[01:59.37]真希望我还能回到那老城小路
[02:02.93]势必要疯狂到尽兴才罢休
[02:06.05]//
[02:06.06]我要在老城小路上 挥鞭策马
[02:09.98]势必要骑到筋疲力尽才罢休
[02:13.48]我要在老城小路上 挥鞭策马
[02:17.05]势必要骑到筋疲力尽才罢休
